Author: 246tnt
Content: So I'm trying to work on the power gates for TT but hitting some DRC errors. In particular `NP.12` I don't understand.

Author: 246tnt
Content:
`NP.12 : Overlap with P-channel poly2 gate extension is forbidden within 0.32um of P-channel gate.`

Which I understand as, "NPlus can't overlap poly that's used by a pmos if that poly is closer than 0.32um to the actual gate zone"

Author: 246tnt
Content: But then I get this from the DRC. ( Only `COMP` / `Nplus` / `Poly` shown ). And the `Nplus` doesn't overlat `Poly` _at_ _all_ ...
